Name: Vengeful Retribution
Story Background: After losing everything to a cruel betrayal, a powerful mage is consumed by revenge, tapping into dark magic to seek vengeance.
Ability: Target opponent sacrifices two creatures. If a creature was sacrificed this way, Vengeful Retribution deals damage to any target equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.
Appearance Description: The art depicts a sinister figure surrounded by ethereal, shadowy flames, with outstretched hands commanding a swarm of vengeful spirits.
